profile.description.first: I am Ismaël, with more than three decades of navigating the dynamic currents of life's great journey.
profile.description.second: With a fervent passion for syntax in all its forms, from the elegance of literature to the precision of code, my journey has led me from a three-year tenure in an agency to a new chapter as a developer.
